derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French suspens 'abeyance', based on Latin suspensus 'suspended, hovering, doubtful', past participle of suspendere (see suspend)

entry.tran: (对可能发生之事的)兴奋，紧张，担心，挂虑
entry.def: Suspense is a state of excitement or anxiety about something that is going to happen very soon, for example about some news that you are waiting to hear.

example.ex: The suspense over the two remaining hostages ended last night when the police discovered the bullet ridden bodies.
example.tran: 随着昨晚警方发现了弹痕累累的尸体，人们对剩余两名人质的担心也终告结束。

example.ex: ...a writer who holds the suspense throughout her tale.
example.tran: 使故事从头到尾充满悬念的女作家

entry.def: If you keep or leave someone in suspense, you deliberately delay telling them something that they are very eager to know about.

example.ex: Keppler kept all his men in suspense until that morning before announcing which two would be going...
example.tran: 开普勒让所有的下属都焦急地等待着，直到那天上午才宣布哪两个人去。

example.ex: 'Go on, don't leave us in suspense,' Dennis said.
example.tran: 丹尼斯说：“接着说，别吊我们胃口了。”

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易受感染的,易受影响的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sus在……下面+cept拿+ible可..的→能被拿下→易受影响
sus在……下面+cept拿+ive……的→有拿下的能力→有接受力的
sus在……下面+ten支撑+ance表名词→支撑下去的东西→粮食;坚持
sus在……下面+spect看→在下面看一看→suspect怀疑
sus在……下面+pend挂→挂在下面→悬挂
sus在……下面+pens挂+e→一颗心挂着
sus在……下面+spir呼吸+e→喝望
sus在……下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =expend,表示"花费,支付"; 2. 最初意思为"称重量而衡量……",引申出花费,支付; 3. =hang,表示"悬挂"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可分配的,不是必要的,可有可无的
stems_affixes.word_buile: dispense分配+able可以……的→dispensable可分配的→能分送出去的,不重要的
ex出+pens花费,支付+ive……的→要花很多钱出去的
pens称重量+ive……的→衡量→思考
dispense分配+ary场地→dispensary分配[药]的地方→药房

stems_affixes.value_cn: 费用, 代价, 损失
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pens花费,支付+e→花钱出去
pens花费,支付+ion表名词→用以花费,支付的
pro多+pens花费,支付+ity性质,特性→某[方面]花费的多→嗜好
suspense[v.担心;悬而不决]+ion表名词→n.悬挂,暂停,停职;悬[置]架
com全部+pens支付+ate表动词→为……而全部支付→赔偿
dis分开+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
re回+com全部+pens支付+e→回报
sus下面+pens挂+e→一颗心挂着

means.word_mean: 悬念，悬而未决；不确定；挂念，牵挂

让某人担心挂念，让某人处于紧张状态
